entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 4:35 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
